item.title: Integrate Jfrog Artifactory with AWS Managed workflow for Apache Airflow üîç
item.description: Integrate Jfrog Artifactory with AWS Managed workflow for Apache Airflow Overview When managing data pipelines and workflows in AWS Managed Apache Airflow, it’s often necessary to integrate with various external services for tasks such as downloading binaries, libraries, or other dependencies. JFrog Artifactory is a popular binary repository manager that allows you to securely store and manage artifacts. Integrating JFrog with AWS Managed Apache Airflow enables seamless and secure downloading of these artifacts, ensuring that your workflows can reliably access the necessary resources.
